00234                     NL_isInsideInterval<T>( r_, (T)0.0, (T)1.0 ),

00309 
00310     static const Color4& colorBasic( const NL_INDEX& i )
00311     { 
00312       switch( i % 7 )
00313       {
00314         CASE  0: return( colorRed   () );
00315         CASE  1: return( colorGreen () );
00316         CASE  2: return( colorBlue  () );
00317         CASE  3: return( colorYellow() );
00318         CASE  4: return( colorCyan  () );
00319         CASE  5: return( colorPink  () );
00320         CASE  6: return( colorWhite () );
00321 
00322         DEFAULT:
00323         return( colorWhite() );
00324       }
00325     }
00326 
00327     static Color4 colorBasic49( const NL_INDEX& i )
00328     {
00329       NL_INDEX i0 = i % 7;
00330       NL_INDEX i1 = ( i0 + i / 7 ) % 7;
00331 
00332       Color4 c0 = colorBasic( i0 );
00333       Color4 c1 = colorBasic( i1 );
00334 
00335       Color4 c;
00336       c.setInterpolation( c0, c1, T(0.25) );
00337       return( c );
00338     }
00339 
00340     static const Color4& colorBasicRand()
00341     {
00342       return( colorBasic( rand() % 6 ) );
00343     }

00357               const T& g,

00359               const T& a = T(1) ) 
00360     {

00363                    NL_isInsideInterval<T>( b, (T)0.0, (T)1.0 ),
00364                    NL_isInsideInterval<T>( a, (T)0.0, (T)1.0 ) );
00365       v4().set( r, g, b, a ); 
00366     }

00373     template< class U >
00374     void setInteger( const U& r,
00375                      const U& g,
00376                      const U& b,
00377                      const U& a )
00378     {
00379       NL_ASSERT( NL_isInteger<U>() );
00380       r_ = NL_rateInterval<T,U>( r, 0, 255 );
00381       g_ = NL_rateInterval<T,U>( g, 0, 255 );
00382       b_ = NL_rateInterval<T,U>( b, 0, 255 );
00383       a_ = NL_rateInterval<T,U>( a, 0, 255 );
00384       NL_ASSERT( isValid() );
00385     }

00398       r_ = NL_rateInterval<T,U>( r, 0, 255 );
00399       g_ = NL_rateInterval<T,U>( g, 0, 255 );
00400       b_ = NL_rateInterval<T,U>( b, 0, 255 );
00401       a_ = T(1);
00402       NL_ASSERT( isValid() );

00689 //
00690 // Typedefs Color:
00691 //
00692 typedef Color4< NL_FLOAT  > Color4F;
00693 typedef Color4< NL_DOUBLE > Color4D;
00694 
00695 NL_DEFINE_IS_RAW_TYPE( Color4F );
00696 NL_DEFINE_IS_RAW_TYPE( Color4D );
00697 
00698 template<> inline NL_Tokenizer& operator > ( NL_Tokenizer& t, Color4F& c ) { return( t > c.v4() ); }
00699 template<> inline NL_Tokenizer& operator > ( NL_Tokenizer& t, Color4D& c ) { return( t > c.v4() ); }

00762 //
00763 template<> inline
00764 void NL_set( NL_String& dest, const Color4F& orig )
00765 {
00766   dest.format( "r: %f \n, g: %f \n, b: %f \n, a: %f \n",
00767                orig.r_, orig.g_, orig.b_, orig.a_         );
00768 }
00769 
00770 //
00771 template<> inline
00772 void NL_set( NL_String& dest, const Color4D& orig )
00773 {
00774   dest.format( "r: %f \n, g: %f \n, b: %f \n, a: %f \n",
00775                orig.r_, orig.g_, orig.b_, orig.a_         );
00776 }
